name: DHOME
short_description:
DHOME is an open source web interface that controls your home automation box i.e. Zipabox and gathers data from it to have a complete analysis of your energy consumption.

The applications provided by home automation companies do not provide deep analysis of data; they do not give you the opportunity to cross different data, merely to visualize a short presentation of your temperature, electricity consumption and other information. Our goal is to give the user full access to all of this, in a simple and intuitive way.

Our project is currently only compatible with the Zipabox by Zipato. We aspire to making it compatible with a great number of other ones.

DHOME is destined for people to use in their private domicile, but also for companies looking to measure their offices' impact.
summary: Open source home automation web interface to analyze your energy data.
